string.text: Aroth-8

An experimental and unstable artifact, created by artificial means. Where and under what circumstances it formed, is unknown. It seems to improve the natural healing process of the body via methods unknown to science.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Easy

A lump of shriveled clay and organic debris. Separation of individual lumps of material seems impossible, due to the presence of some unknown and incredibly strong binding agent.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Easy

A lump of shriveled clay and organic debris. Separation of individual lumps of material seems impossible, due to the presence of some unknown and incredibly strong binding agent. Gives off a slightly disorienting effect that is known to cause headaches.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Magnet

An artefact created in fire anomalies consisting of mostly iron, bismuth, cadmium and nickel. If broken, the interior resembles an infinite fractal.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Magnet

An artefact created in fire anomalies consisting of mostly iron, bismuth, cadmium and nickel. If broken, the interior resembles an infinite fractal.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Mushroom

An artifact containing mostly plant matter found only in the Dead Forest, south of Lab X-9. It is believed that the strong psy-fields it was subjugated to during its formation heavily influenced its shape and properties. Wearing one seems to boost vitality.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Mushroom

An artifact containing mostly plant matter found only in the Dead Forest, south of Lab X-9. It is believed that the strong psy-fields it was subjugated to during its formation heavily influenced its shape and properties. Wearing one seems to boost vitality.

Mushroom

An artifact containing mostly plant matter found only in the Dead Forest, south of Lab X-9. It is believed that the strong psy-fields it was subjugated to during its formation heavily influenced its shape and properties. Wearing one seems to boost vitality.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Mushroom

An artifact containing mostly plant matter found only in the Dead Forest, south of Lab X-9. It is believed that the strong psy-fields it was subjugated to during its formation heavily influenced its shape and properties. Wearing one seems to boost vitality.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Mushroom

An artifact containing mostly plant matter found only in the Dead Forest, south of Lab X-9. It is believed that the strong psy-fields it was subjugated to during its formation heavily influenced its shape and properties. Wearing one seems to boost vitality.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Souvenir

A shard of Silica Quartz formed exclusively in electro anomalies. It is remarkably pure, ranging from 99.5% to 99.9% purity and is known to provide the wearer with a feeling of youthfulness.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Souvenir

A shard of Silica Quartz formed exclusively in electro anomalies. It is remarkably pure, ranging from 99.5% to 99.9% purity and is known to provide the wearer with a feeling of youthfulness.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Sponge

A lump of shriveled clay and organic debris. Separation of individual lumps of material seems impossible, due to the presence of some unknown and incredibly strong binding agent. The gravitational properties of the artefact seem to have effects similar to that of hemophilia.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Sponge

A lump of shriveled clay and organic debris. Separation of individual lumps of material seems impossible, due to the presence of some unknown and incredibly strong binding agent. The gravitational properties of the artefact seem to have effects similar to that of hemophilia.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Talking Stone

A never-before-seen artifact with remarkable properties. It seems to be of organic origin and is very symmetrical; an unusual property for artifacts found in the Zone. It increases the structural and tensile strength of any material it comes in proximity with. Eerily, it seems to release barely audible and unintelligible whispers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Artefact
Kovalev's Laptop

A Laptop containing data from Kovalev's most recent field study of the anomalous areas around the Agroprom Research Institute. Among the files is a map with the exact locations of the anomalies I need to investigate.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Research Assistant's PDA

The PDA of a deceased stalker who helped candidate Pirogov place prototypes in the anomalies around the Garbage. It contains the remaining locations I am supposed to scan.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Deceased Stalker's PDA

The PDA of the deceased stalker who successfully mapped the anomalies in the Red Forest but was ambushed by Monolith on their way back to the scientists. It has dried blood all over the display and some of the buttons don't seem to work.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Operation "Rainbow" Research Report No. 9: "About the Formation of Artifacts

A bundle of papers from the X-19 laboratory. Most of the pages are damp and only the title page is still legible. However, some pictures and diagrams survived and show that the artifacts were somehow "grown" on trees in the forest south of the X-19 complex.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Memory Module VNZ "Circle

An old but sturdily built memory module, retrieved from the derelict Krug Antenna Complex. Restored and repaired by Prof. Vorobushkin, it contains a spectrogram of the anomalous emissions around the station with a detailed map of their sources.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Letter of Commendation

Personalized letter of gratitude, recognizing my services to the scientific community, signed personally by Professor Skabinsky. It also includes a recommendation to employ the holder of this document as Senior Executive Field Researcher at the Scientific Institute for Research of the Chernobyl Anomalous Area.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
